'''General Crab''' is a type of crab that can be found in the wild.

==Drops==
{{Card|Crab|1}}

Catching one for the first time will add this creature's entry into your in-game [[archive]].

==Locations==
Currently, General Crabs can only be found in [[Inazuma]], with 36 of them being on [[Seirai Island]].

See the [https://act.hoyolab.com/ys/app/interactive-map/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=291 Official Interactive Map] for specific locations.
